alert.note: Alert for Horry; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 22 at 6:01PM EDT until April 22 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Horry County in northeastern South Carolina... Central Marion County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 600 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Brittons Neck, or 15 miles southeast of Marion, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Horry, Loris, Galivants Ferry, Adrian, Brittons Neck, Bayboro, Allsbrook, Green Sea, Homewood, Aynor and Loris Community Hospital. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
